scripts.dev:parcel: parcel watch assets/fonts/*.ttf assets/css/main.css assets/css/shadow-particles.css assets/js/application.js assets/js/pwc/tabs.js assets/js/codepen-embed.js assets/images/*.jpg assets/images/*.png assets/images/**/*.{svg,jpg,png} --out-dir ./dist
scripts.prod:parcel: parcel build assets/fonts/*.ttf assets/css/main.css assets/css/shadow-particles.css assets/js/application.js assets/js/pwc/tabs.js assets/js/codepen-embed.js assets/images/*.jpg assets/images/*.png assets/images/**/*.{svg,jpg,png} --out-dir ./dist
